## Introduction

Intro, hvad er det her forsøg osv

**Technical focus:**

::: pf-box
Can α-synuclein seed amplification assays (SAA) reliably detect Parkinson’s disease? We compare fluorescence data from two PPMI projects to assess diagnostic potential.
:::

## Inconsistencies in the two projects: Replications

::: {.panel-tabset style="color: black"}
### Variation

![](../results/06_fmax_by_rep.png){width="2200"}

### Standard deviation

![](../results/06_sd_by_project.png){width="2200"}

### Stats

```{r eval = FALSE, echo = TRUE}
repeats_fmax_stats <- aug_data |> 
  ungroup() |> 
  summarize(mean=mean(fmax), 
            median=median(fmax),
            IQR = quantile(fmax,.75)- quantile(fmax,.25),
            .by = c(project, rep))
```

Summary statistics:

| Project | Rep 1 - Median | Rep 2 - Median | Rep 3 - Median | Variation |
|---------|----------------|----------------|----------------|-----------|
| **155** | 72,926         | 70,262         | 69,721         | 3,205     |
| **237** | 142,138        | 135,570        | 137,200        | 6,568     |

| Project | Rep 1 - IQR | Rep 2 - IQR | Rep 3 - IQR | Variation |
|---------|-------------|-------------|-------------|-----------|
| **155** | 69,736      | 69,404      | 82,973      | 13,569    |
| **237** | 59,530      | 63,910      | 63,179      | 4,380     |
:::

```{r eval = FALSE, echo = TRUE}
sd_instruments_stats <- sd_saa_data |> 
  ungroup() |> 
  summarize(mean=mean(fmax_sd), 
            median=median(fmax_sd), 
            IQR = quantile(fmax_sd,.75)- quantile(fmax_sd,.25),
             .by = c(project, instrument))
```
